titles.title: A bill to amend the Safe Drinking Water Act to reauthorize the New York City Watershed Protection Program.
A bill to amend the Safe Drinking Water Act to reauthorize the New York City Watershed Protection Program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Inhofe with an amendment. With written report No. 108-205.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 406.

term.name: Federal aid to water pollution control
Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: Amends the Safe Drinking Water Act to reauthorize the New York City Watershed Protection Program through 2004.
